Scene:
Village of Ninokuchi
(Ninokuchimura / 新口村)

Play: The Amorous Courier (傾城恋飛脚)

Production: September 1972 Bunraku Kyōshitsu

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))
